PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-02912017-03-28,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of GEORGE ERNEST PUGH of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a part-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of eight months, or until such time as a new member is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
